component.name: Tauon Music Box
component.summary: Play your music collection with style

description.p: Tauon Music Box is a modern, comfortable and streamlined music player for the playback of your local music collection.

Packed with features while maintaining simplicity. Use drag and drop files for easy direct file importing. Allows you to manage your music collection with built-in functions such as file renaming, cover art downloading and file deleting.

ul.li: Compatible with most common audio files including MP3, FLAC, APE, TTA, M4A and OGG
Lookup artists on Rate Your Music
Create a topchart grid image of your favorite albums
Scrobble and love tracks to last.fm
Support for Listenbrainz and launching Musicbrainz Picard
Monitor your downloads and import archives in one click
Includes large album art and album gallery layouts
Transcode folders to dedicated output folder for easy copying to devices
Support for lyrics, synced lrc files and displaying lyrics with guitar chords
Multiple preset UI themes to choose from
Additional mini and micro UI modes
